title: Droid Systems Schema
description: Schema for Droid Systems, Accessories, and Equipment in Star Wars SAGA Edition. Designed to accommodate data from CSV, Core Rulebook, and other supplements.

droid_systems_data.description: Wrapper object for the list of droid systems.

description.default: Compilation of Droid Systems, Accessories, and Equipment for Star Wars SAGA Edition.

source_details_object.description: Specifies source information for a piece of data.

source_book.description: Abbreviation of the source book (e.g., CR, SGD, KOTORCG).

page.description: Page number or page range in the specified source book.

reference_type.description: Nature of the information from this source.

notes.description: Optional brief note about this specific source reference.

value_object.description: Represents a value that could be a direct number, a text description, or based on a multiplier.

base_value.description: The direct numeric value (e.g., cost in credits, weight in kg) or a string if non-numeric (e.g., 'Varies', 'See Notes').

factor_multiplier.description: A multiplier if the value is based on a factor (e.g., 20 for '20 x cost factor').

factor_basis.description: Describes what the factor multiplier applies to (e.g., 'droid_size_cost_factor', 'chassis_base_price').

text_override.description: A complete textual description if the value cannot be easily structured (e.g., 'See Armor Table, CR p.132').

droid_system_entry.description: Represents a single droid system, accessory, or piece of equipment.

id.description: Unique identifier for the droid system (e.g., snake_case_name_source_book_page).

name.description: Name of the droid system (from CSV 'DROID SYSTEM').

primary_source.description: Primary source book and page for this system entry, typically from the CSV.

description_text.description: Descriptive text of the system and its general function (from CSV 'Desc.').

group.description: General categorization of the system (from CSV 'GROUP').

cost_details.description: Cost of the system in credits. Can be a direct value, based on a cost factor, or a textual reference.

weight_details.description: Weight of the system in kg. Can be a direct value, based on a weight factor, or a textual reference.

availability_text.description: Availability code or description (e.g., L, Re, U, M, I, -, from CSV 'AVAIL.').

benefits_and_comments.description: Summary of game mechanical benefits, effects, or other comments (from CSV 'COMMENTS & BENEFITS').

detailed_rules_and_effects.description: More detailed structured rules, specific game mechanics, or effects if not fully captured in benefits_and_comments. Can be Markdown formatted text for complex descriptions.

system_type_tags.description: Additional specific tags for categorization or mechanics (e.g., 'Visual Sensor', 'Repulsorlift', 'Melee Weapon Mount', 'Energy Shield').

prerequisites_text.description: Textual description of any prerequisites for installing or using this system (e.g., droid size, specific chassis feature, other systems).

installation_dc_mechanics.description: Typical Mechanics DC to install this system into a droid chassis.

installation_time_text.description: Typical time required to install this system (e.g., '1 hour', '10 minutes per slot').

slots_required.description: Number of system slots this component might occupy on a droid chassis, if applicable by specific construction rules.

power_consumption_notes.description: Notes on power requirements or if it draws significantly on a droid's power supply.

image_url.description: URL to an image of the droid system, if available.

additional_source_references.description: List of other source books and pages where this system or substantially similar versions are detailed or expanded upon.
